metadata.name: C# IL Code Compilation Via Ilasm.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the use of "Ilasm.EXE" in order to compile C# intermediate (IL) code to EXE or DLL.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\ilasm.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('ilasm.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of "Ilasm.EXE" in order to compile C# intermediate (IL) code to EXE or DLL.
